fixes.name: MUSH Delta Down Diff GBP
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MUSH Delta Down T GBP] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau field references to DAX table[column] format and kept the multiplication operation. The dependent fields are referenced from the same table.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation depends (via the 'Date Sign' field) on Tableau parameters; any expression referencing Parameters must be created as a measure.
